info.title: Love Note
info.overview: You are in school where love and rumors are running rampant. Lovers are secretly filling out a Love Note. Tattle Tales are on the prowl, looking for any sign of love so they can tattle on the Lovers. Friends are helping lovers pass the Love Note.

win.bullet-1: Lovers need to fill out a Love Note to win.
win.bullet-2: Tattle Tales need to find the Lovers and tattle on them to win.
win.bullet-3: Friends need to help out the lovers.

play.bullet-1: To draw tap on the deck.
play.bullet-2: To play a card tap on a card and press the button in the top right. Tap the card again to cancel.

card-0.name: Love Note
card-0.description: A love note that gets passed around, lovers must write at least x amount of notes in the Love Note to win the game. If a Lover is holding this card, they can treat this card as any number.

card-1.name: Tattle
card-1.description: Tattle on a lover for passing notes in the classroom. If tattle is successful, the lovers are sent to detention and the Tattle Tales win the game. If a Tattle Tale is holding this card, they can treat this card as any number.

card-2.name: Pass Direction
card-2.description: Every student must pass their lowest or highest card (depending on the priority) to the direction displayed. If 'Opposite Day' card has been played, the direction and priority are changed to its opposite.

card-3.name: Trade Snacks
card-3.description: Pick a student to give you their lowest or highest card (depending on the priority), you may give them any card in your hand in exchange.

card-4.name: Nosy Glance
card-4.description: A good day to be nosy, pick a student to peek at the cards in their hands.

card-5.name: Meddle
card-5.description: You tamper with the love note; Lovers can add a note to the love note without holding the love note, Tattle Tales can remove a note without holding the love note.

card-6.name: Opposite Day
card-6.description: It's opposite day! Once this card is played, the direction and priority of the Pass Direction card is now opposite.

card-7.name: Rainy Day
card-7.description: It's raining cats and dogs! A note got smeared off from the rain. If this card is drawn, it must be played.

card-8.name: Cupid
card-8.description: Cupid has come from above! Everyone must select the lowest or highest card (depending on the priority) in their hand and place it in the middle. Lovers can swap a card in their hand for any student's card. The lovers cannot see the card they choose.
